creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
A sideeffect of moving to resource based stylesheets is that when xslt does its
work, it converts any xsltFile attribute into a resource, which it then stores
as an xsltResource. Unfortunately, that stops the task being used more than
once, as second time round, there is now an xsltResource attribute as well as an
xsltFile, and that is forbidden.

Error is surfacing in Ivy under Gump: 


  <target name="ivy-report" depends="ivy-resolve" if="ivy.found">
    <ivy:report todir="${ivy.reports.dir}"/>
    <echo> published Ivy report to
${ivy.reports.dir}
    </echo>
  </target>
